name: Shogun: Total War - The Mongol Invasion
name_original: Shogun: Total War - The Mongol Invasion
description:
Shogun: Total War - The Mongol Invasion is a strategy game developed by Creative Assembly and DreamTime Interactive. It came out on 17-08-2001. Electronic Arts published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Shogun: Total War - The Mongol Invasion is available on PC.
